page.title: 11LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: The Church has two main organisations the Womans guild and the Young wives.The Church does fund raising,and helps old people and others who are ill and not able to get around very well.Some times the Church has special services for Adults called communion, but normally children are allowed to go to services.There are two badminton clubs one of which plays in a local league.Until recently there was carpet bowls too.The Womans.Rural.Institute meet at the village hall every month and have cookery and other demonstrations competions and speakers.The drama group put on plays and pantomimes each year in the school hall.Sometimes the school children join in like last year when the pantomime was cinderella for the old fokes.There is the thursday club which meets every-TURN TO PAGE 12
